Autonomous Builder","details":"Built for @VavityV's idea. Follows CEI pattern, no ReentrancyGuard needed. How it works: 1. Admin creates a round with N memecoins (by symbol) 2. Admin commits to winner hash BEFORE betting closes (commit-reveal) 3. Users place wagers on their pick during betting window 4. After deadline, admin reveals the winning coin (must match commitment) 5. Winners split the pot proportionally, minus platform fee 6. If admin fails to resolve within timeout, users can claim refunds Fee: 5% (50% to idea contributor, 50% to EMBER stakers via FeeSplitter)","errors":{"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"cancelRound(uint256)":{"params":{"_roundId":"The round to cancel"}},"claimWinnings(uint256)":{"params":{"_roundId":"The round to claim from"}},"commitWinner(uint256,bytes32)":{"details":"Hash = keccak256(abi.encodePacked(roundId, winningCoinIndex, salt))","params":{"_commitmentHash":"The hash of (roundId, winningCoinIndex, salt)","_roundId":"The round to commit for"}},"createRound(string[],uint256)":{"params":{"_coins":"Array of coin symbols (e.g., [\"PEPE\", \"DOGE\", \"SHIB\"])","_duration":"How long the betting window stays open (in seconds)"},"returns":{"roundId":"The ID of the created round"}},"emergencyRefund(uint256)":{"params":{"_roundId":"The round to claim refund from"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"placeWager(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_coinIndex":"Index of the coin to bet on","_roundId":"The round to bet on"}},"resolveRound(uint256,uint256,bytes32)":{"params":{"_roundId":"The round to resolve","_salt":"The salt used in the commitment hash","_winningCoinIndex":"Index of the winning coin (must match commitment)"}},"setFeeRecipient(address)":{"params":{"_feeRecipient":"New fee recipient address"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"params":{"newOwner":"The address of the new owner"}}},"title":"MemePrediction","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"cancelRound(uint256)":{"notice":"Cancel a round (users can immediately claim refunds)"},"claimWinnings(uint256)":{"notice":"Claim winnings from a resolved round"},"commitWinner(uint256,bytes32)":{"notice":"Commit to a winner before betting closes (commit-reveal scheme)"},"computeCommitment(uint256,uint256,bytes32)":{"notice":"Helper to compute commitment hash (use off-chain, save the salt!)"},"createRound(string[],uint256)":{"notice":"Create a new prediction round"},"emergencyRefund(uint256)":{"notice":"Emergency refund if admin fails to resolve within timeout"},"getCoinTotal(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Get total wagered on a specific coin in a round"},"getRound(uint256)":{"notice":"Get round details"},"getWager(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Get user's wager for a round"},"isBettingOpen(uint256)":{"notice":"Check if betting is still params._duration: How long the betting window stays open (in seconds)

returns.roundId: The ID of the created round

params._roundId: The round to claim refund from

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._coinIndex: Index of the coin to bet on

params._salt: The salt used in the commitment hash
params._winningCoinIndex: Index of the winning coin (must match commitment)

params.newOwner: The address of the new owner

cancelRound(uint256).notice: Cancel a round (users can immediately claim refunds)

claimWinnings(uint256).notice: Claim winnings from a resolved round

commitWinner(uint256,bytes32).notice: Commit to a winner before betting closes (commit-reveal scheme)

computeCommitment(uint256,uint256,bytes3.notice: Helper to compute commitment hash (use off-chain, save the salt!)

emergencyRefund(uint256).notice: Emergency refund if admin fails to resolve within timeout

getCoinTotal(uint256,uint256).notice: Get total wagered on a specific coin in a round

getWager(uint256,address).notice: Get user's wager for a round

isBettingOpen(uint256).notice: Check if betting is still open

isRefundAvailable(uint256).notice: Check if emergency refund is available for a round

placeWager(uint256,uint256).notice: Place a wager on a coin

renounceOwnership().notice: Renounce ownership is disabled to prevent accidental lockout

resolveRound(uint256,uint256,bytes32).notice: Resolve a round by revealing the committed winner
